articles.title: Devastated Caribbean assesses damage as hurricane Melissa eyes Bermuda
articles.summary: Hurricane Melissa was approaching Bermuda on Thursday (October 30, 2025) after tearing a path of destruction across the Caribbean that left at least 24 people dead in Haiti, and parts of Jamaica and Cuba in ruins. articles.title: Bangkok Post - Turkey says Pakistan - Afghanistan talks to resume
articles.summary: World Turkey says Pakistan-Afghanistan talks to resume PUBLISHED : 31 Oct 2025 at 02:45 WRITER: AFP Small Medium Large Listen to this article Play Pause The border between the two countries has been closed for more than two weeks. (Photo: AFP) ISLAMABAD (PAKISTAN) - Pakistan and Afghanistan will hold another round of peace talks in Istanbul next week and will maintain a ceasefire until then, Turkey's foreign ministry confirmed late Thursday.
